items.title: UI not showing in DAW
items.body:
### Thanks for giving yabridge a shot!

- [X] I read through both the troubleshooting and the known issues sections, and my issue wasn't listed there

### Problem description

The plugin UI is not showing in DAW. The plugin is loading standalone, but if I load it in the DAW, the UI is not showing 

However, the sound of the plugin is playing (Vinyl)

Ubuntu 23.04
Artutia V, iZotope Vinyl
Yabridge 5.0.5

### What did you expect to happen?

UI should be displayed 

### What actually happened?

UI is just a copy of the background 

### Operating system

Ubuntu 23.04

### How did you install yabridge?

Copied the files using the tar command 

### yabridge version

5.0.5

### yabridgectl version

5.0.5

### Wine version

Tried different Versions. 8.0 Staging from repos, Gnome bottles and crossover linux

### Plugin

Artutia V, iZotope Vinyl

### Plugin type

VST2

### Plugin architecture

64-bit

### Host

Waveform 12

### Desktop environment or WM

Gnome on Xorg 

### GPU model

Intel 

### GPU drivers and kernel

_No response_

### Debug log

_No response_

### Anything else?

_No response_
